TopicTitle: "Test TD-25 Decoupler landed at Kerbin" issue

Articles.Content:
Hello,

Tried activating the TD-25

  • at launch pad
  • after launching then landing away from base
  • splashing down in the ocean

Check marks for Kerbin and Landed are green on the contract display for the first two but the contract doesn't complete after activating the TD-25.  Any ideas?  Searched the forums but nothing relevant came up.

Thanks in advance for any suggestions or help.

Some things need you to test them by right clicking, instead of staging. I don't know why.

If that doesn't work, I'd like to see a screen shot of your ship landed with all the check boxes checked.

And if all else fails, you can fix it by alt-f12 contract debugging, and complete the contract that way. You'll get the money and everything. It's not cheating if you're doing it to get around a bug.

On 7/14/2020 at 12:25 AM, Superfluous J said:

Some things need you to test them by right clicking, instead of staging. I don't know why.

If that doesn't work, I'd like to see a screen shot of your ship landed with all the check boxes checked.

And if all else fails, you can fix it by alt-f12 contract debugging, and complete the contract that way. You'll get the money and everything. It's not cheating if you're doing it to get around a bug.

Right click just gives decouple; attached a screenshot.  Appreciate the Alt-F12 hint, used it to clear the contract.

Thanks much!
